The rod is stationary, so the net force on it is zero.
The gravitational force on the rod is mg.
The magnetic force on the rod is BIL.
The direction of the magnetic force is determined by the right-hand rule.
The magnetic force must balance the gravitational force.
The current direction is from c to d.
The magnitude of the current is I = mg / (BL).
Substitute the given values to find I.
